name: universal-ui
description: A universal front-end component library for building functional yet beautiful interfaces.

scripts.css-minify-main: cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/universal.min.css dist/css/universal.css && cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/universal-grid.min.css dist/css/universal-grid.css && cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/universal-utilities.min.css dist/css/universal-utilities.css && cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/universal-reboot.min.css dist/css/universal-reboot.css
scripts.css-minify-rtl: cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/universal.rtl.min.css dist/css/universal.rtl.css && cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/universal-grid.rtl.min.css dist/css/universal-grid.rtl.css && cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/universal-utilities.rtl.min.css dist/css/universal-utilities.rtl.css && cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/universal-reboot.rtl.min.css dist/css/universal-reboot.rtl.css
